tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ankesh Jain is very good he has excellent convincing power for patient to understand each and every thing.
I am undergoing his treatment day first but doesn't feel like he had extracted my teeth no pain at all.
Would love to recommend this type of doctor to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am really thankful to have met Dr. Ankesh Jain who bailed me out of this, would definitely recommend him for maxillofacial surgeries, for being cooperative and an expert at his work, politely & patiently answering all the queries, seamless and comfortable post operative care & follow-up, and above all for being approachable & accessible throughout the period of entire treatment phase.

Due to an accident i had fractures (at 4 points) in my left side zygomatic bone also resulting into blockage and numbness of left nasal cavity and left upper jaw. 

Dr. Ankesh, an expert in maxillofacial surgery, explained me about the entire process of surgery to post-hospitalization stages pertaining to complete cure of the issue at hand. This context communication was really helpful to me. Through his diagnosis/evaluation, he recommended me to undergo maxillofacial surgery to fix implants/steel plates to take care of fractures of the zygomatic bone.    

He was genuinely concerned about the plight of the patient (pain, psychological trauma, surgery scars on the face, aftereffects of surgery, etc.), while performing the surgery he made sure to have minimal scars on the face and having the stitches inside the mouth. During the hospitalization phase (before and after the surgery), he visited me multiple times to make sure that progress was as per the plan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jain is really nice and constantly goes above and above his duties. Not to add that he makes sure to change his time for our convenience, and I would absolutely refer him to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So a person like me who has a major phobia with dentists and hospitals
I had my wisdom tooth surgery and teeth clean up, trust me it was super easy, I was too scared in the beginning, but Dr Ankesh Jain is an expert he understands the pain you'll go through and he explains it very well step by step, so that there are no painful surprises, hence the communication helps. Nobody can escape the pain in the beginning, but with the right guidance and communication with doctor it was very easy and painless, for a person like me I'm super scared of needles, and I'm way to skeptical about everything.
I found my go-to dentist, I would highly recommend to visit there, the equipments, hygiene, technology is top notch and it's quite reasonable too. The sleight of hand of Dr Ankesh Jain is mind-blowing, you'll enjoy the process without any worry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Neat and clean clinic, doctor is very kind and caring. He explains everything about the procedure to us makes us comfortable before starting the treatment. Will call us after the treatment to find out if we are fine He takes special care as we are senior citizens I would recommend them (team) for  treating all your dental problems

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Ankesh Jain on 20th December 2023 at Novadent clinic in Mazgaon. He had recommended me for Wisdom Tooth Extraction. He is highly experienced and I would recommend him for all Dental related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thank you Dr. Ankesh Jain for the great experience and quality work you have done on my teeth. I am usually apprehensive about needles and it was no sweat at all. In fact, I am ready for the next needle, thanks to your gentle touch. My family and I have been pleased with your professional, yet personable, service. See you soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ankesh is very friendly and very professional with his work.
He made sure i don't feel any pain while the tooth extraction.
He made me comfortable everytime when i felt pain in my tooth. He used to talk with me while surgery so that i get distracted and don't feel the pain of extraction.
Utmost care was being taken by him while applying anesthesia and also while doing surgery.
Medicine prescribed by him were very useful.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My go to go dentist..i loved their work since i first visited 
I recommend dr ankesh to everyone who is having dental issues and it is cost friendly and quality work ..
Dr ankesh is friendly and makes you understand what to do and what not to..
Both are great dentist he and his wife 
I recommend everyone everyone to go and try them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: For me Dr.Ankesh & his Wife Dr.Nisha are very humanly and very much practical *** ************* about their work as a surgeon and dentist, both of them are giving true justice to their profession during this highly testing times of pendemic and thereby helping society as a whole by being true to their profession. At the age of 46 I have met very few Doctors/Dentists who are realistic and down to earth. Thanks to Both. Recommend to all my near and dear ones.

review: I visited for my daughters root canal and namaste wisdom tooth removal.. had a very smooth experience. Dr Ankesh and Dr Nisha were very patient and explained the procedure very nicely. Dr. Ankesh did my tooth removal under laughing gas as I was very anxious and scared. However it was a good experience and my fear of dentists is no more. I would highly recommend novadent clinic for all your dental needs.
